A form-filling function for users to input personal information and credit status
An introduction section to credit repair services
A browsing interface for users to learn about credit repair services
A lead submission form for collecting user information
Frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
Backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Repository package.json configured with npm run install:all to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Repository package.json configured with npm run dev to start both frontend and backend concurrently
Body background styled with old lace color
UI elements styled with rosy brown color
Form validation for user input fields
Data storage for lead information in PostgreSQL database
API endpoints for handling form submissions and credit score inquiries
